column4: I tried installing Ubuntu linux on a machine with an IDE to CF card adapter.  The install went fine, but the machine will not boot on its own: First I get an exception that says 0x6 frozen from initramfs, the last 2 errors are ata1.00: status: { DRDY ERR } and then ata1.00: error: { ICRC ABRT }  any ideas?
ALERT! /dev/disk/disk-by-uuid/(Crazy long string starting 762136ad-...) does not exist. Dropping to a shell!  --- What does this mean??
means your disk is not there
